search_parameters.q: Mothers' Strategies for Children's School Achievement: Managing the Transition to High School. Baker, David P. Stevenson, David L. Sociology of Education

search_information.query_displayed: Mothers' Strategies for Children's School Achievement: Managing the Transition to High School. Baker, David P. Stevenson, David L. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Mothers' strategies for children's school achievement: Managing the transition to high school
organic_results.snippet: The American educational system requires parents to manage their child's school career to maximize their child's school achievement. But parents differ in the specific strategies they select to help their children through school. These strategies are one way in which family background influences children's school achievement. We expand the extant model of how parents influence their children's school careers to encompass various pragmatic strategies devised for the crucial transition to high school. We analyze the responses of a small …
